import { useState } from "react"; const Register = () => { const [userData, setUserData] = useState({ email: String, username: String, password: String, avatar: String, }); console.log(userData) return (
Choose your avatar:
setUserData((prev) => ({ ...prev, avatar: e.target.files[0] }))} />
setUserData((prev) => ({ ...prev, username: e.target.value })) } />
setUserData((prev) => ({ ...prev, email: e.target.value })) } />
setUserData((prev) => ({ ...prev, password: e.target.value })) } />
); }; export default Register;
